ygData.subject: RE: [eqpaladin] Help
ygData.msgSnippet: If you have the money, then it certainly wouldn t hurt to have a magical weapon.  It s been a long time, but I m pretty sure you should be able to handle wisps
ygData.messageBody:
If you have the money, then it certainly wouldn't hurt to have a magical
weapon. It's been a long time, but I'm pretty sure you should be able to
handle wisps solo, which would be a good source of experience and money.
Probably a little bit early to think about hunting ghouls though ; )

Peace favor your sword,
Jarad Argentedge
39th level Paladin of Tunare
Blue Rose Order
Povar


From: "Steven Dunn" <dragonsd@...>

Hi all. I'm a lvl 8 Pally(of course) on Brell Serelis server. I
was
wondering if it would be a good idea to buy a Combine Scim to
replace
my Bronze Scim. Is this a good idea or a waste of money?

Kenidil LVL 8 Helf-Elf on Brell Serelis
